package.name: auto-invoice-free-extension
package.summary: Auto Invoice Extension was designed to automatically change order status by sending invoice email to customers.
package.description:
Auto Invoice Extension features a convenient Magento payment process which was designed to change order status automatically after generating invoice.
- Enable automatic invoice and shipment generation based on payment methods. - Automatically create and change order status. - Send invoice e-mail to customer.
package.notes: New Released: - Enable automatic invoice and shipment generation based on payment methods. - Automatically create and change order status. - Send invoice e-mail to customer.
